title: Vikings fans convinced Bjorn will die in season 6 after French trailer
text:
Vikings fans are getting even more anxious ahead of the final season after a French trailer dropped last week, with viewers now convinced Bjorn’s death is coming.

The History epic is loosely based on actual recordings of Vikings from centuries ago, but should the series kill off their leading protagonist, we’re heading completely off tangent.

The latest clip dropped last week and features plenty of Queen Lagertha (played by Katheryn Winnick) with her electric white hair, while among the inevitable battles of bloodbath is a funeral, which was initially thought to be the mother of Bjorn’s.

She may be a goner, but for fans it looks like Lagertha won’t be the only one.

‘Bjorn dies !!!???!?! The drakkar the other crying or I’m afraid! I can not wait for you more,’ one French fan cried, which was followed by: ‘Björn is dead.’

‘Damn it Bjorn and Lagertha definitely died in this trailer,’ moaned another, while this particularly disgruntled viewers commented below a YouTube video: ‘Soooo, what was the point in making Bjorn the king of Kattegat if now it’s pretty obvious that he’s going to die?’

Is Alexander Ludwig brown bread in Vikings season 6? (Picture: History)

Alexander Ludwig, who starred as Bjorn since 2014, recently got fans hyped ahead of season six, warning his 2.3 million Instagram followers the final chapter gets ‘insane’.

‘I hope you are all as excited as I am for the epic ending all our amazing fans deserve,’ he said before adding: ‘But before that..it gets insane…. so much love to you all.’

The star continued: ‘I really can’t believe we have managed to end the show the way we hoped we would when we started. It is all because of you! Enjoy!’

Vikings returns to History in the US and Amazon Prime in the UK on December 4.
